<H1 CLASS="western">Glossary</H1>
<BR>
<TABLE WIDTH=643 BORDER=1 CELLPADDING=4 CELLSPACING=0>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncSharp</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Name of our sync tool</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncTask</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Configuration file that contains source and target directory
			information to be synchronized</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncProfile</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Contains list of SyncTasks for a Particular PC/Laptop</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>FileUnit</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Abstract representation of a file or folder, contains
			information such as name, size, hash code, last modified date,
			etc.</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>PlugSync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>A feature in our program. Program will run by itself while
			the USB is plugged into a computer. Upon execution, the program
			will count down for 5 seconds waiting for user interruption. If
			there is no interruption, the program will automatically try to
			perform all the saved SyncTask.</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>1 way sync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Update destination directory to have the same content as
			source directory</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>2 ways sync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Update source and destination directories to have the same
			state</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Report/Logger</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Log file that records the operations perform in the
			synchronization process</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Target</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>The destination directory to be sync or compared</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Detector</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>The sub-system that detect changes of the source or
			destination directory</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Reconciler</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>The sub-system that resolves conflicts between the source &amp;
			destination directories</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>TaskSettings</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=350>
			<P><I>Contains configuration settings made for each SyncTask</I></P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
</TABLE>
